verses.text: \w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Amorite \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w west|strong="H3220"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Canaanite|strong="H3669"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* \w along|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* coast \f + \fr 5:1 \ft That is, along the Mediterranean coast; literally along the sea\f* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \w how|strong="H5704"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w dried|strong="H3001"\w* \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w crossed|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w*,\f + \fr 5:1 \ft Or until we had crossed over\f* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* \w melted|strong="H4549"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w spirits|strong="H7307"\w* \w failed|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w fear|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w At|strong="H3478"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w time|strong="H6256"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* said \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “\w Make|strong="H6213"\w* \w flint|strong="H6697"\w* \w knives|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w circumcise|strong="H4135"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w once|strong="H7725"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.\f + \fr 5:2 \ft Literally again the second time\f*”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w flint|strong="H6697"\w* \w knives|strong="H2719"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w Gibeath-haaraloth|strong="H1389"\w*.\f + \fr 5:3 \ft Gibeath-haaraloth means the hill of the foreskins.\f*

\w Now|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w why|strong="H1697"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* \w them|strong="H3318"\w*: \w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*—\w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H2145"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w*—\w had|strong="H3091"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w in|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5971"\w* \w had|strong="H3091"\w* \w left|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*, \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w born|strong="H3209"\w* \w in|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w wandered|strong="H1980"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* forty \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w*’s \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w war|strong="H4421"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* died, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*. \w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w vowed|strong="H7650"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* land \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* fathers \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* land \w flowing|strong="H2100"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w milk|strong="H2461"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w honey|strong="H1706"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w raised|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w these|strong="H6965"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w ones|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*. \w Until|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w* \w along|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1471"\w* \w after|strong="H1961"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w* \w circumcised|strong="H4135"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w stayed|strong="H3427"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w camp|strong="H4264"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w healed|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, “\w Today|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w rolled|strong="H1556"\w* \w away|strong="H1556"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2781"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w*.” \w So|strong="H7121"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w been|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \f + \fr 5:9 \ft Gilgal sounds like the Hebrew for roll.\f* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w On|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w while|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w Gilgal|strong="H1537"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w plains|strong="H6160"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w kept|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w after|strong="H4283"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*, \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w very|strong="H6106"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* ate \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w roasted|strong="H7033"\w* grain \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w produce|strong="H5669"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* land.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w day|strong="H4283"\w* \w after|strong="H4283"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* eaten \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w produce|strong="H8393"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land, \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w ceased|strong="H7673"\w*. \w There|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w more|strong="H5750"\w* \w manna|strong="H4478"\w* \w for|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*, \w so|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w began|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* eat \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w crops|strong="H8393"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* land \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Canaan|strong="H3667"\w*. The Commander of the LORD’s Army

\w Now|strong="H1961"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w near|strong="H5048"\w* \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w he|strong="H3027"\w* \w looked|strong="H7200"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5375"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w front|strong="H5048"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w drawn|strong="H8025"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w in|strong="H3212"\w* \w His|strong="H5375"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* approached \w Him|strong="H3027"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* asked, “\w Are|strong="H5869"\w* \w You|strong="H7200"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w us|strong="H7200"\w* \w or|strong="H2719"\w* \w for|strong="H3027"\w* \w our|strong="H7200"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6862"\w*?”

“\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w*,” \w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w replied|strong="H1696"\w*. “\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w come|strong="H5307"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w Commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w*.” \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w reverence|strong="H7812"\w* \f + \fr 5:14 \ft Or and paid homage or and worshiped\f* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w Him|strong="H6440"\w*, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w does|strong="H4100"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w say|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w His|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*?”

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Commander|strong="H8269"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w army|strong="H6635"\w* replied, “\w Take|strong="H6213"\w* \w off|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w sandals|strong="H5275"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w* \w where|strong="H4725"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w standing|strong="H5975"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.” \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w*.
